title: Let’s Mix What We Like!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Phew, so busy~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>What’s wrong, Ai-chan? Can I do something to help?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Would you, Emmacchi? You see, my local shopping district is doing a summer festival~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>A summer festival!? I want to help!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Thanks! So, Ai was having a hard time figuring out what monja we should serve at our stall. Do you have any good ideas?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>An orthodox monja would be the best, but....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Absolutely, Emmacchi~♪ But we need some exciting menu to catch the attention of all the kids who don’t eat monja all that much. What special monja would you like to try?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Me? I would.... Hmm.... I want to eat one with all kinds of cheese.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>A monja with all kinds of cheese.... and the cheese would streeeeetch out....! That sounds amazing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, right? Plus, the flavor changes based on the type of cheese you use!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Alright, Ai will go with that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
